name: Animal Run (ChuRoo64, MarCC19)
description:
Animal Run was made in Unity. The goal is to make to end of each level by dodging and shooting obstacle. The game have fifteen levels divided by three difficulties, easy, medium, and hard.

Control (Menu)

Arrow key - Move 

z - Comfirm

x -Back

Control (GamePlay)

Arrow Key - Move

z - Shoot

x - Jump
